---
title: "Create API from Food Inspections Model"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(vetiver)
library(pins)
library(plumber)
library(rsconnect)
library(xgboost)

board <- board_connect()

# Serve the plumber API --------------------------------
vetiver_deploy_rsconnect(
  board = board, 
  name = "ryan/inspections-xgboost-model",
  predict_args = list(debug = TRUE, type = "prob"),
  account = "ryan"
)
```
